Charles Max Wood: Get a Coder Job eBook and Course

40% off until my plane leaves for Ignite

Afully updated video guide to get a programming job:
  • Proven Strategy. An effective job search starts by choosing the job you want and working to get hired at that company. Learn how to get noticed, interviewed, and hired.
  • Step-by-step Instructions. Worksheets released with each video and included as part of the series.
  • Video Tutorials. Provides a series of recorded video walkthroughs of each of the strategies outlined in the book as well as explanations of the concepts involved in a successful job search.
  • "Get a Coder Job" ebook. As the ebook is being written, you'll be given pre-release copies to help jumpstart your job search.

90 Day Money Back Guarantee

If our videos and ebook don't help you find a job within 90 days, we'll give you your money back.

No questions asked. Period. 

Why Wait? Jumpstart your job search today:

In the Videos, You Will Discover:

HOW TO GET NOTICED BY HIRING MANAGERS AND THEIR DEVELOPERS

Getting a job is much easier when the people you will work with and who are doing the hiring already know you.

The first step in getting to know future bosses and co-workers is getting noticed. This video series covers how to get noticed in a variety of ways through many different avenues.

HOW TO IDENTIFY COMPANIES YOU WANT TO WORK FOR

Instead of taking any job that will have you, why not pick the companies you'd like to work for and then get hired there?

This video series goes into how to identify companies that are good candidates for you and then into how to get noticed by their employees and how to get hired.

HOW TO PUT TOGETHER A WINNING RESUME AND INTERVIEW STRATEGY

There's a lot more to submitting resumes and doing interviews than just showing up. This video series will show you how to build a resume that will get you interviews and how to ace the interview and get hired.

HOW TO BUILD RELATIONSHIPS THAT LEAD TO GETTING HIRED

Once you've gotten noticed by potential employers, building relationships is key to getting the job you want.

This video series will provide you with strategies for getting to know people and finding mentors in the field that can help you find good jobs with good companies.

About theAuthor: Charles Max Wood

Charles Max Wood is the CEO and founder of Devchat.tv. He's the host of several podcasts including Ruby Rogues and JavaScript Jabber.

Charles has coached and mentored dozens of developers from beginner to advanced in areas of both technology and career. He's helped several of them find their first programming job or their first remote programming job.

He has used these same techniques to find several jobs himself and numerous freelancing clients with both local and remote companies.

90 Day Money Back Guarantee

If our videos and ebook don't help you find a job within 90 days, we'll give you your money back.

No questions asked. Period. 

AFully Updated Guide to get a Programming Job

Are you stuck trying to find a programming job?

Well, look no further...

Our video course and ebook will show you the strategies that work to get you noticed by the companies you want to work for and get you hired.

From resumes to interviews and salary negotiations, our videos and ebook will show you the most effective way to get the best job out there for you.

Why Wait? Jumpstart your job search today:
